name: Stellar Vanguard
author: guitarninja
lore:
In a time of great strife and conflict across the cosmos, the once warring civilizations of the universe found themselves on the brink of annihilation. Countless lives were lost, planets devastated, and the fabric of the universe itself was threatened by the unending cycle of destruction.

Amidst the chaos, a visionary alliance of the most advanced and enlightened of the human race emerged, realizing that the path of constant war and conquest would lead to the doom of all. This alliance, known as the United Star Accord, came together with a shared mission – to preserve peace and ensure the survival of humankind throughout the universe.

To fulfill this noble purpose, the United Star Accord created an army of superhuman marines like none ever seen before – the Stellar Vanguard. The creation of the Stellar Vanguard was a groundbreaking feat of science and cooperation, drawing upon the collective knowledge and expertise of the alliance's member civilizations.

At the heart of the Stellar Vanguard's creation lay the discovery of a cosmic phenomenon known as the Celestial Nexus – a rare and powerful cosmic event that occurred once in a millennia. Harnessing the energy of the Celestial Nexus, the United Star Accord initiated the Stellar Ascension Project. Through a carefully designed and ethically guided process, individuals from different species were selected to undergo the Stellar Ascension.

During the Stellar Ascension, these chosen individuals were infused with celestial energy, undergoing a transformative process that unlocked the hidden potential within their genetic makeup. They became superhuman in every sense – their strength, agility, reflexes, and intellect far surpassed that of any natural being.

Yet, the Stellar Vanguard was not only powerful physically but also equipped with advanced technology and weaponry. Each member was equipped with a state-of-the-art Stellar Armor, capable of withstanding the harshest environments of space and the most formidable foes. The armor granted them the ability to traverse planets, traverse through wormholes, and even survive the vacuum of space.

The Stellar Vanguard became the beacon of hope and the peacekeeping force for the entire universe. They would intervene in conflicts, act as mediators, and offer their formidable might to quell any threats to peace. Their presence alone acted as a powerful deterrent against those who sought to disrupt the newfound harmony.

Over time, the Stellar Vanguard's reputation as protectors and defenders grew, and countless beings across the universe looked up to them as symbols of hope and unity. They became ambassadors of the United Star Accord, promoting diplomacy and cooperation among civilizations, and working towards a future where peace would reign supreme.

As the Stellar Vanguard continued to carry out their mission, they encountered a myriad of challenges and sacrifices. Their journey was not without loss, but their unwavering commitment to peace and preservation fueled their resolve. Their collective spirit became a testament to the potential of unity and the boundless capacity of compassion and empathy to bridge the gaps between diverse species.

Through their actions, the Stellar Vanguard not only brought peace to the universe but also ushered in a new era of interstellar cooperation and shared knowledge. Their story would forever be etched into the annals of history, inspiring generations to come and reminding all that the path to peace was a journey worth undertaking – a journey that could reshape the destiny of the universe itself.

arch_marine.name: Arch-Marine
arch_marine.description: One of the original founders of the Imperial Squad and an extremely powerful leader.

lieutenant_on_bike.name: Lieutenant on Bike
lieutenant_on_bike.description: A fearless leader on combat bike.

captain_on_bike.name: Captain on Bike
captain_on_bike.description: A fearless leader on combat bike.

captain_juggernaut.name: Marine Juggernaut Captain
captain_juggernaut.description: An elite and heavily armed combat walker piloted by a fearless leader.

psychic_on_bike.name: Psychic on Bike
psychic_on_bike.description: A fearless psychic on combat bike.

engineer_on_bike.name: Engineer on Bike
engineer_on_bike.description: A fearless marine engineer on combat bike.

zealot.name: Zealot
zealot.description: An armored priest who blesses their allies and smites their foes.

zealot_on_bike.name: Zealot on Bike
zealot_on_bike.description: An armored priest on a combat bike who blesses their allies and smites their foes.

surgeon.name: Surgeon
surgeon.description: A fearless battlefield medic trained in saving lives.

surgeon_on_bike.name: Surgeon on Bike
surgeon_on_bike.description: A fearless battlefield medic on combat bike trained in saving lives.

vanguard_squad.name: Vanguard Squad
vanguard_squad.description: Elite trained marines sworn to protect humankind.

gravite_vanguard_squad.name: Gravite Vanguard Squad
gravite_vanguard_squad.description: Elite trained marines in heavy gravite armor.

scout_squad.name: Scout Squad
scout_squad.description: Elite trained marines specialized in infiltration and stealth tactics.

assault_squad.name: Assault Squad
assault_squad.description: A squad of assault marines equipped to fight in close combat.

assault_veteran_squad.name: Assault Veteran Squad
assault_veteran_squad.description: A squad of elite assault marines equipped to fight in close combat.

veteran_squad.name: Veteran Squad
veteran_squad.description: Elite veteran marines sworn to protect mankind.

hazard_squad.name: Hazard Squad
hazard_squad.description: Elite, well-equipped marines specialising in high-tech weaponry.

marine_bikers.name: Vanguard Biker Squad
marine_bikers.description: Upgraded and highly trained bikers armed to the teeth.

scout_bikers.name: Scout Bikers
scout_bikers.description: Upgraded and highly trained bikers specialized in infiltration and stealth.

gravite_assault_squad.name: Gravite Assault Squad
gravite_assault_squad.description: Marines clad in heavy gravite armor equipped to fight in close combat.

honor_guard.name: Honor Guard
honor_guard.description: Marines clad in golden armor and wings with dangerous melee weapons.

werewolves.name: Werewolves
werewolves.description: Marines that are half marine and half werewolf.

combat_speeders.name: Combat Speeders
combat_speeders.description: Fast-flying hovercraft designed to rush down the opponent.

devastation_squad.name: Devastation Squad
devastation_squad.description: A squad of highly trained marines armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

gravite_blade_squad.name: Gravite Blade Squad
gravite_blade_squad.description: Marines wearing experimental Gravite armor with heavy swords and shields.

elimination_squad.name: Elimination Squad
elimination_squad.description: Elite trained marines with long ranged weapons, tasked with eliminating threats.

gravite_devastation_squad.name: Gravite Devastation Squad
gravite_devastation_squad.description: Elite trained marines in heavy gravite armor armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

marine_apc.name: APC
marine_apc.description: A durable transport built by the imperial marines.

marine_heavy_apc.name: Heavy APC
marine_heavy_apc.description: A heavy transport built by the imperial marines.

drop_pod.name: Drop Pod
drop_pod.description: A durable transport built by the imperial marines.

marine_heavy_gunship.name: Heavy Gunship
marine_heavy_gunship.description: A heavy transport and fire support gunship.

marine_artillery_vehicle.name: Artillery Vehicle
marine_artillery_vehicle.description: An armored artillery vehicle helmed by imperial marines.

marine_battle_tank.name: Battle Tank
marine_battle_tank.description: An armored tank helmed by imperial marines.

marine_strike_tank.name: Strike Tank
marine_strike_tank.description: A lighter tank with increased speed helmed by imperial marines.

marine_heavy_battle_tank.name: Heavy Battle Tank
marine_heavy_battle_tank.description: An heavy armored tank helmed by imperial marines.

marine_assault_juggernaut.name: Marine Assault Juggernaut
marine_assault_juggernaut.description: A heavily armed combat walker kitted for melee destruction.

veteran_marine_juggernaut.name: Veteran Marine Juggernaut
veteran_marine_juggernaut.description: An elite and heavily armed combat walker.

psychic_grand_master.name: Psychic Grand Master
psychic_grand_master.description: A Master of psychic powers and martial combat, wielding heavy destroyer armor.

psychic_juggernaut.name: Psychic Juggernaut
psychic_juggernaut.description: A heavy psychic walker with heavy weapons and extreme combat prowess.

grand_master_juggernaut.name: Grand Master Juggernaut
grand_master_juggernaut.description: A large psychic walker with heavy weapons and extreme combat prowess.

psychic_marine_squad.name: Psychic Squad
psychic_marine_squad.description: Marines trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

purge_squad.name: Psychic Purge Squad
purge_squad.description: Marines trained to hunt demons with heavy psychic weapons.

teleport_squad.name: Psychic Teleport Squad
teleport_squad.description: Marines trained to hunt demons with teleporting backpacks.

psychic_destroyers.name: Psychic Gravite Marines
psychic_destroyers.description: Marines in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_paladins.name: Psychic Gravite Paladins
psychic_paladins.description: Tough marines in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

multi_scanner.name: Multi-Scanner
multi_scanner.description: Once per round, this unit may re-roll an Initiative test.

magnetic_grapple.name: Magnetic Grapple
magnetic_grapple.description: Units engaged in Melee with a model that has this weapon suffer -2 to Initiative tests when escaping combat for each model with this rule.

walker_transport.name: Walker Transport
walker_transport.description: This model may carry X _Walker_ or _Juggernaut_  models inside of it.

legend_master_duelist.name: Master Duelist
legend_master_duelist.description: This model gains +1 Strength when fighting enemy _Leader_ models.

legend_drill_sergeant.name: Drill Sergeant
legend_drill_sergeant.description: This model's unit adds +3" to the short and long range of their weapons.

legend_master_duelist.name: Master Duelist
legend_master_duelist.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Master Duelist.
legend_master_duelist.flavor: This master of the blade has struck down countless foes, earning them this grim title.

legend_energy_shield.name: Personal Shield Generator
legend_energy_shield.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ or _Support_ model with Resistant(2).
legend_energy_shield.flavor: This shield generator can be overcharged to bounce back even the toughest attacks for a moment.

legend_drill_sergeant.name: Drill Sergeant
legend_drill_sergeant.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Drill Sergeant.
legend_drill_sergeant.flavor: Through years of hard training and bellowing commands the effective range of infantry can be pushed past the limit.

strategies.name: Vigilance
strategies.description: Use when a unit takes an Initiative test. That unit is treated as having +2 Initiative for that test.
strategies.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these soldiers are trained to react to any situation.

strategies.name: Masterfully Engineered
strategies.description: Use before taking Save rolls for a unit. Reduce the AP of all hits by 2.
strategies.flavor: With the best implants and engineering that can be found, it's easy to take a hit and keep standing.

strategies.name: Fearless
strategies.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
strategies.flavor: Marines are trained to stay strong even in the toughest fights.

empower.name: Empower
empower.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gains +1 Strength and +1 Accuracy until the end of the turn.

snare.name: Snare
snare.description: Target enemy unit within 18" has -2" Movement until the end of the turn.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: Target friendly unit within 24". Until the end of the round, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 2 or less, that hit is ignored.
